name: Exxon Mobil tokenized stock (xStock)
description: Exxon Mobil xStock (XOMx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. XOMx tracks the price of Exxon Mobil Corporation (the underlying). XOMx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of Exxon Mobil Corporation, whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. Key Benefits ExxonMobil is a multinational oil and gas corporation that operates in over 100 countries. They are known for their integrated fuels, lubricants, and chemical businesses, as well as their focus on developing and applying next-generation technologies to address global energy needs
